title: Boldomatic: The Worlds Top-Rated Mobile & Web Platform for Quotes, Savings & Everything Text Launches Major Update
text:
Boldomatic contains more than 750,000 Quote: s, sayings, phrases, idioms and statements that users can freely re-post and share to multiple networks. The no-cost iOS and Android app also features weekly creative writing contests, and offers several enhanced features in the latest version (2.2).
Cupertino, CA (PRWEB) October 07, 2015
Fans of the globally popular app Boldomatic -- the triumphantly shameless, partially offensive yet strangely profound platform for Quote: s, sayings and everything text -- has been updated (v2.2) with several new features and improvements, and is available now from the App Store and Google Play. A web version is also available at http://www.boldomatic.com .
Acclaimed by TechCrunch as “the Instagram for text”, and featured by Apple more than 500 times worldwide, Boldomatic offers an ever-growing catalog of more than 750,000 Quote: s, sayings, phrases, idioms and statements that are rated by popularity, and range
from the mildly profane to the remarkably profound.
Users can freely re-post and share any Quote: or saying to multiple networks, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr and Pinterest. They can create profiles yet choose to stay completely anonymous, and access the app’s easy-to-use editor to translate their thoughts into compelling text-images. Boldomatic has a global following of active creative writers in over 170 countries; many of whom participate in the app’s weekly creative writing contests for a chance to earn prizes.Brands are getting in on the action by sponsoring contests so they can reach a high quality, global community of potential brand ambassadors and directly benefit from the content submissions.
Swiss-based Boldomatic takes immense pride in the fact that the app reflects what it calls the “purest Swiss design and engineering”, which has resulted in an intuitive layout and interface that is exact and elegant.
And now in the latest version 2.2 writers can:
See what their favorite writers “like” and have commented on. Include taglines in their posts with their @handle. Get suggestions for writers based on who they’re following. Access continuously scrolling news. Enjoy improved maps and faster loading times.
“Whether people want to discover Quote: s, freely express themselves, meet like-minded new people, style photos with text or simply explore random thoughts Boldomatic has something for everyone,” commented Steffen Schietinger CEO of Boldomatic. Boldomatic also offers the possibility to order any text on print, apparel and accessory on high quality products. http://www.boldomatic.com/shop
Version 2.2 of Boldomatic, the world’s top-rated mobile and web platform for Quote: s, sayings and everything text, is available now from the App Store at https://itunes.apple.com/app/boldomatic-Quote: s-everything/id573250776 , and from Google Play at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boldomatic&hl=en .
Additional app details including screenshots are available at:
http://boldomatic.com/web/press
For all other information or media inquiries, contact Mark Johnson on behalf of Boldomatic
SA at +1 408 757 0156 or press (at)appshout(dot)com.
About Boldomatic
Boldomatic is a content-creation platform and community; determined to conquer the world of words in social media. Launched in November 2012 by the Swiss based creative agency Nerves as a first-of-a-kind, Boldomatic's vast catalogue has grown to over 750’000 posts with press reviews from Techcrunch, Neue Züricher Zeitung, Weave and a nomination for the Swiss App Awards.
Various brands have partnered with boldomatic including the Red Cross, Sat1, WWF, NZZ and Ceylor.
